tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am from Mumbai, we have been married for 3 years, after 1 year of marriage we were taking chances for a baby, but no success, further my husband shifted to hyderabad for work, eventually I also came here, and we decided to come here and see a gynecologist, but we An outsider didn't know which doctor to trust, I came to know about Dr. Rupa ma'am from Google, the review was good,Our treatment started, Dr. Rupa mam talks to the patient very well, not scary at all, and we got the result in 5 months, thanks to you doctor, I am in 5 months now,
You are guiding me well in my pregnancy, and yes thank you little stars care & she hospital also, the staff here is also good, personally we had a very good experience, again thank you so much

review:
Dr Roopa Ma'am is very patient friendly and compassion, in actively listening to my case history and pretty quick to access my health condition  in providing  simple effective solution with least possible medication. Her approach gave lot of confidence to undergo the required procedure. 

My heart felt gratitude to Roopa Ma'am üôè  and I strongly recommend her to anyone who is looking for apt treatment for gynic issues  :-)

Nazia was experienced nurse who was by my side during the surgery. The facilities of the hospital were top notch.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been consulting with Dr. Roopa Ghanta for almost 6 years. During pregnancy also I consulted her and my experience was very good, our little princess saw her first light on 12 May 2020. I delivered baby during Covid-19 pandemic situation and was little afraid. Me and my husband were alone and due to Covid-19, no one from our family was able to come. Doctor has been very supportive in this situation and tried to calm me down always if I was in tention. She does not scare much and told us how to take care of myself and baby during pregnancy. She does not explain things in too much details and try to keep things point to point, does not scare much, which we liked. She answers our questions and doubts pretty well. I have the habit of reading and getting all the info, so was not depending on doctor for everything. But if some people want to completely depend on doctor, then they should ask themself with doctor their doubts. If we ask anything, she eill explain nicely.. She always used to repond on whatsapp if I ask any question which was very much needed in this pandamic situation. Many times i was able to resolve my queries on whatsapp which avoided going to hospital on this Covid situation. Even now after my delivery, if i ask her anything on whatsapp she still helps me.Overall i can say i am happy with doctor the way she has helped me during my pregnency journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Gynae Problems,Gynaecological Endoscopy,Nutrition for Pregnant Women,Pregnancy Hypertension (Preeclampsia/ Eclampsia),
review: ** ******** ** *** *** ********** ** *** ****** *** ********** We followed her each and every instructions, tests whatever she asked. *** ***** ****** ********* **** ******** *** **** **** **** ********* **** ******** ******* ** *** **** *** ** **** ****** ******** **** ****** ***** **** *** *** ******** *** she won‚Äôt spend time on going through scan reports ******** *** **** ********* ******** Even though scan was done one week prior, she will again ask to get it done by her again in same hospital (Only God knows why as she won‚Äôt give any explanation). No input on care, food, medicine side effect, ******** ******** **** **** **** ********* **** ******** My daughter in law called her few times to say that her legs are swelling and can she visit her. She said don‚Äôt worry, it happens and pain is normal after changing some medicines. Within couple of days in 24th week of pregnancy, my daughter in law had severe bleeding. Apollo cradle staff said your reports are missing although entire 6 month tests were done in the same hospital. Somehow they found it, asked to arrange blood before starting operation. Admin lead was called to explain the NICU charges first before patient was taken care of. ****** ****** *** ** ***** Dr. came later and started surgery saying there is low chance of baby survival. When we asked until last week you said things are normal and even two days back you ignored the leg swelling, *** *** ***** **** *** ******* ****** *** **** ****** ** ***** ***** *** **** *** **** *** ***** ** *** ***** Baby was delivered and that my baby poor soul died in 4 days.
